title: (NA) Veritas Salutare Looking for Diamond Support
body:
Who are we?

We're team Veritas Salutare, or VS for short. We're an amateur team who've had some success on the tournament circuits, and are looking to improve our play further until "some success" becomes "total domination". We've recently had some roster shifts, and now we're looking for a new support. Our current roster is: UltimateTrianer, VS Dreamweaver, VS brubie (myself), and Grumpyvegan. We also have a sister team who we scrim with regularly.

What we're looking for:

A diamond, or upper platinum support, preferably with previous team experience and a mature disposition. A versatile champion pool is recommended, though we're not outright mandating any. There's plenty of time to improve, so we're focusing on people who have an attitude we like, and if you do demonstrate toxicity, you will be immediately removed from consideration or from the roster.
We play most weekdays starting at 7PST(PM) until ~10 or 11 PST, and often at various times on the weekend.

Application:

IGN:
Current Ranking:
Age:
Time Zone:
Champion Pool:
About Yourself:
What would you bring to our team?


Feel free to contact me IG, at VS brubie. WE will be hosting try-outs tonight.

replies.body:
IGN: I Only Hook
Current Ranking: Diamond 5
Age: 17
Time Zone: Pacific (California)

Champion: I can play all supports, but my main champions are Thresh, Morgana, Blitzcrank, and Leona

About Yourself: I've played on several serious teams before, I'm pretty much flexible enough to fit whatever schedule the team has. I also play on www.twitch.tv/kireiautumn quite often, so check back there every once in a while, and you might see me play :)

What would I bring to the team?: I would bring plenty of vision for the team, plenty of flash hooks to go around, and plenty of wins on our match history :P

IGN: Lokijuh
Current Ranking: Plat 2
Age: 27
Time Zone: CST
Champion Pool: Thresh, Blitz, leona, morgana, nami, sona, Braum
About Yourself: Used to be on a D2+ ranked team as the support till the jungler left for IRL issues then the top left for another team and took the adc and the team disbanded :( I'm pretty talkative during games once i get comfortable with the team.. able to shot call or at least make suggestions if i see them available.
What would you bring to our team?  A winning attitude

IGN: selfz
Current Ranking: d3
Age: 19
Time Zone:est
Champion Pool: thresh leo janna ali morg
About Yourself: played with several diamond teams b4, won triumphant ryze in some of them.
What would you bring to our team? good gank set ups + warding
